start

Specified by:
start in interface GameMethods

nextPhase

public void nextPhase()
Prepares and returns the next action in the sequence. This method can change the active player, so always use this method before getting the active player.

The sequence of actions in a turn:
  1. TURNINCARDS
  2. PLACEMENT
  3. ATTACK
  4. MOVEMENT

Specified by:
nextPhase in interface GameMethods

getWinner

public Player getWinner()
Returns the winner of the game, if there is one.
If the game isn't finished yet, null will be returned.
